name: Rail Delivery Group
goal: Rail Delivery Group (RDG) was established in 2011 to provide industry leadership following Government review and consulted on by the ORR. The RDG brings together Network Rail, passenger and major freight operators to provide leadership and inform Government, funders and regulatory bodies on priorities and solutions for the rail industry. RDGâ€™s board consists of the CEOs of the major rail owner groups and Network Rail.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
